content: the criss-cross bucket hat is a free beginner-friendly crochet pattern for a summer bucket hat/sun hat the pattern provides details for five sizes - baby child teen adult and large adult gauge using a h8/5 mm crochet hook and worsted weight cotton yarn a magic_ring with 8 half_double_crochet should measure 3/4 inch in diameter materials * cotton worsted weight yarn make sure both your main color and contrast color are the same thickness * h8/5 mm crochet hook * scissors * yarn needle you will need about one full skein or half a cone of the main color and just a small amount of each of the contrasting colors of cotton yarn
